I think the transaction confirmation dialog should use the same unit as the send screen. So you could make two pull requests:

1 - add sat / (v)byte to the dropdown on the send screen
2 - add fee per (kilo)byte to the confirmation screen (this PR) 

Nit: I would move the fee per size inside brackets at the end, e.g. "0.00002220 BTC added as transaction fee (0.221 kB at 10.0452 sat/byte)"

@Sjors I agree that it's a good idea to do 2 different PRs for these changes. Adding the ability to specify custom fees in sat/vbyte is a decent chunk of work because of the way the Custom Fee text field reuses the `BitcoinAmountField` widget which is used in a couple different places in the UI (like when selecting an amount of BTC to send in a transaction, and to receive). \n\nI think the best
